name: Rock Paper Swing
description:
Rock, paper, scissors with a friend but this time each round gives a certain amount or points for each player depending on the option both chose. Play rounds until the song finishes, the player with the most points at the end wins.

I made this project as practice at Centro de Cultura Digital in Av. Paseo de la Reforma S/N, Juárez, Miguel Hidalgo, CDMX. As a part of a game development course called Mermelada de Juegos.

It's more of a prototype since it's not really polished, but you can still have fun with it. 

Player 1 plays with WASD, player 2 with the arrows, each key is a different option (rock, paper, scissors, nothing) yes, even nothing is an option here. The basic rules for rock, paper, scissors apply, but each combination gives or takes different amount of points.

Left/A -> Rock

Down/S -> Paper

Right/D -> Scissors

Up/W -> Nothing (can´t harm, but you lose less points if harmed)
